p: The structural interaction of prepared chitosan film incorporated plant essential oil was analyzed by FT-IR with the following reference of Jiang et al. (2020). The tested powder samples of chitosan, Chitosan loaded essential oil were recorded from the peak range at 4000–400 cm-1 by F-IR (Nexus, Shimadzhu, Japan) with 64 scans recorded at 4 cm -1 resolution.
